name: Brown, Sen Bob
text:
—I seek leave to take note of those letters.
Leave not granted.

name: Ellison, Sen Chris (Manager of Government Business in the Senate)
text:
—I seek leave to move a motion relating to the hours of meeting and routine of business for today.
Leave not granted.

name: O’Brien, Sen Kerry
text:
asked the Minister representing the Minister for Local Government, Territories and Roads, upon notice, on 11 April 2005:
For the financial year 2004-05 to date, on what occasions has the Minister’s special advisor, Mr Graeme Hallett, attended public meetings of Wyong Shire Council and its committees, and on each occasion: (a) was the attendance authorised by the Minister; and (b) can details of the meeting be provided including when the meeting was held, its location, the nature of the meeting and the purpose of Mr Hallett’s attendance.
For the financial year 2004-05 to date, on what occasions has the Minister’s special advisor, Mr Graeme Hallett, attended private meetings at the Wyong Shire Council chambers, and on each occasion: (a) was the attendance authorised by the Minister; and (b) can details of the meeting be provided including when the meeting was held, who attended the meeting, the nature of the meeting and the purpose of Mr Hallett’s attendance.

name: Campbell, Sen Ian
text:
—The Minister for Local Government, Territories and Roads has provided the following answer to the honourable senator’s question:
Minister Lloyd did not request his Special Adviser, Mr Graeme Hallett, attend any public meetings of Wyong Shire Council and its committees. (b) Not applicable.
Minister Lloyd did not request his Special Adviser, Mr Graeme Hallett, attend any private meetings at the Wyong Shire Council chambers. (b) Not applicable.
